str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.

str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

str2: To become old, grow old. From geras; to be senescent.
